docs.lead_paragraph: Prof. Felix Adler delivered the second of his series of lectures on "The Essentials of Morality" at Carnegie Music Hall yesterday morning before a large audience. His specific subject was "The Art of Self-Mastery."

headline.main: THE ART OF SELF-MASTERY; Prof. Adler Continues at Carnegie Hall His Lectures on the Essentials of Morality. NEED OF SCIENCE IN EDUCATION Advantages of Imposing Restraint Upon the Temper, Passions, and Appetites -- Death and Life in the Power of the Tongue.

docs.abstract: Evangelist Work in New York City
docs.snippet: Prof. Felix Adler delivered the second of his series of lectures on "The Essentials of Morality" at Carnegie Music Hall yesterday morning before a large audience. His specific subject was "The Art of Self-Mastery."
